dcterms:creator: Dheeru Dua
Casey Graff
dcterms:description: This dataset includes information of customers taking credit at a bank. The task is to classify a customer as a good (label 1) or bad (label 0) credit risk.
dcterms:title: German Credit

dcterms:creator: Ron Kohavi
Others
dcterms:description: The dataset was extracted from the US 1994 census data on adult incomes. The task is to classify if an individual’s income exceeds $50,000 per year (label 1) or not (label 0).
dcterms:title: Adult Income

dcterms:creator: Mohan S Acharya
Asfia Armaan
Aneeta S Antony
dcterms:description: The set contains data of Indian students’ applications to a Master’s program. The task is to determine if a student profile has a higher chance of being successful at their application.
dcterms:title: Graduate Admission

dcterms:creator: Paulo Cortez
Alice Maria Gonçalves Silva
dcterms:description: This dataset records the performance of students at two schools. The task is to predict if a student achieves a final score above average (label 1) or not (label 0).
dcterms:title: Student Performance
